notes.content:
=== RAG on SAP Data (Vector Engine + Generative AI Hub) ===
‚Ä¢ "Analyze [business documents/emails/tickets] and summarize key decisions, action items, and owners in 5 bullet points."

‚Ä¢ "Answer: [business question]. Use ONLY the provided context from HANA Cloud Vector Engine. If insufficient, state: 'I do not have enough information.'"

=== AI-Powered Development (Joule + Build Code) ===
‚Ä¢ "Generate a CAP service for managing customer complaints integrated with S/4HANA with CRUD handlers, input validation, authorization checks, and unit tests."

‚Ä¢ "Create a Node.js CAP service that: 1) Reads BusinessPartner from S/4HANA API, 2) Enriches with sentiment analysis via AI Core, 3) Returns JSON response."

=== Workflow Automation (Build Process Automation) ===
‚Ä¢ "Design a workflow to automate: [business process description]. Return JSON spec with steps, decisions, service tasks, and human approval points."

‚Ä¢ "Request an approval to move sales order 8001234 delivery from March 15 to March 10; this is high urgency for our top customer."

=== Joule Studio - Custom Skills ===
System Prompt Template:
"You summarize long business texts (emails, meeting notes, ticket logs) into concise summaries.

Guidelines:
- Output language: same as input
- Length: max {word_limit} words
- Focus on decisions, open actions, and owners
- Exclude greetings and informal chit-chat
- Never invent facts not present in the input text"

=== Multi-Step Orchestration ===
‚Ä¢ "For customer ACME in the US: 1) Summarize all open sales orders with delivery dates in the next 30 days. 2) Identify those at risk due to material availability or credit blocks. 3) Propose an action plan and draft an email to the account manager."

=== Architecture Patterns (Design Phase) ===
‚Ä¢ "Analyze this business goal: [goal description]. List the 3-5 most promising SAP BTP generative-AI patterns with required services (AI Hub, HANA Vector Engine, Build Process Automation), data needed, and key risks (hallucination, data leakage, latency)."

=== Key Resources ===
‚Ä¢ Joule Studio: https://joule-studio.build.cloud.sap
‚Ä¢ AI Core SDK: https://github.com/SAP/ai-sdk-js
‚Ä¢ BTP Generative AI Hub: https://help.sap.com/docs/sap-ai-core
‚Ä¢ CAP Samples: https://github.com/SAP-samples/cloud-cap-samples
notes.title: Joule Prompts Library - BTP & AI Core

notes.content:
BTP Services Pricing (PUPM Model):

=== Core Services ===
‚Ä¢ Cloud Foundry Runtime: $0.03/GB-hour
‚Ä¢ HANA Cloud: $3.50/GB-month
‚Ä¢ PostgreSQL: $0.50/GB-month

=== AI Services ===
‚Ä¢ Generative AI Hub: $0.50 per 1000 API calls
‚Ä¢ Document Information Extraction: $0.40/page
‚Ä¢ AI Core (training): $2.00/GPU-hour

=== Integration ===
‚Ä¢ Integration Suite: $500/tenant/month
‚Ä¢ API Management: $250/tenant/month

=== Low-Code ===
‚Ä¢ SAP Build Apps: $10/user/month
‚Ä¢ SAP Build Process Automation: $25/bot/month

üí° Cost Optimization Tips:
‚Ä¢ Use free tier for dev (200 AUs/month)
‚Ä¢ Scale HANA compute separately from storage
‚Ä¢ Use Cloud Foundry vs Kyma based on workload
‚Ä¢ Monitor with SAP Cloud ALM

Pricing Calculator:
https://discovery-center.cloud.sap/estimator
notes.title: BTP Services Pricing (2025)
